mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR_INFO ( COMPANY_ID, HR_ON_JOB, USER_ID, IS_DELETE, IS_DELETE_TIME) VALUES ( #{companyId}, #{hrOnJob}, #{userId}, 0, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE HR_INFO SET COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}, HR_ON_JOB = #{hrOnJob}, USER_ID = #{userId} WHERE HR_ID = #{hrId} AND IS_DELETE = 0
UPDATE HR_INFO SET IS_DELETE = 1, IS_DELETE_TIME = NOW() WHERE HR_ID = #{id}
